content: i free handed this bag for the upcoming evil dead the musical show i m going to and posted a picture on facebook after overwhelming admiration of my project on my post i decided to whip up a pattern for the bag in only eight short hours please forgive any errors or confusing parts send me a message if you have any questions enjoy your new necronomican ex-mortis bag book of the dead connect with me here 1 i do not charge for my patterns but if you would like to support my work you can tip me on venmo @thoseyellowthings 1 https //www flowcode com/page/thoseyellowthings
